resources.string: "%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
You have been disconnected due to inactivity
To connect to this Danfoss Eco™ this app must be updated
You have recently replaced battery and lost time synchronization
The device will soon run out of batteries, replace immediately
Batteries Empty, Replace immediately. The valve is opened to prevent frost damages to the system
Front temperature sensor damaged, contact dealer
Valve or center temperature sensor damaged, contact dealer
Motor jammed, try reset and re-mount, if the error persists contact dealer
The valve the thermostat is installed on cannot close correctly, please check the installation
Another user has updated this Danfoss Eco™
Eco is ready to be mounted on radiator
Eco is in frost protection mode
If you enjoy using Danfoss Eco™, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks in advance.
"End prolonged heating period and switch to scheduled heating"
Turn on bluetooth on your phone to connect to Danfoss Eco™
Choose preferred temperatures for the heating schedule
"Do you want to switch on schedule mode on \"%1$s\""
Time and date on Danfoss Eco™ has been synchronized
"This Danfoss Eco™ is locked Enter PIN Code"
Tip: You can switch mode on the Danfoss Eco™ button

"Danfoss Eco™ App - End User License Agreement and Disclaimer
1. License This end user license agreement and disclaimer (“Agreement”) is entered into between Danfoss A/S or its Affiliates (each of which is referred to as “Danfoss”) and you as an end user (“You” or “User”). In this Agreement “Affiliate” shall mean an entity directly or indirectly controlled by Danfoss A/S whether by shares or voting rights.
Upon acceptance of this Agreement Danfoss grants You a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, royalty-free, worldwide license (“License”) to install and use the Danfoss Link (“Application”), for User’s use on any device that User owns or controls. The License is granted subject to User’s compliance with the following: a) The terms of this Agreement b) Danfoss Terms of Use (available at www.Danfoss.com) c) Danfoss Privacy Policy (available at www.Danfoss.com)
2. Consent to use of data By installing and using the Application you agree that Danfoss may collect, use, register and store information concerning your heating requirements, user set-points, IP-addresses, software and hardware attributes, connection errors and user interaction. Such information is used by Danfoss to improve default settings and enhance the performance of the Application.
3. Proprietary Rights This License and the Application contains proprietary information which is owned by Danfoss and protected by applicable intellectual property rights. Except as expressly permitted herein, such Danfoss information herein may not i. be used for any purpose except in compliance with this Agreement, ii. be copied or reproduced in any form, or iii. be modified, rented, leased, sold, distributed or exploited commercially.
Danfoss reserves the right to change, suspend, remove or disable User’s access at any time without notice. The Danfoss name, Danfoss logo and other Danfoss trademarks, graphics and logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of Danfoss or its affiliated companies. User is granted no right or license with respect to such trademarks.
4. Third Party Components The Application may include certain third party software components (\"Third Party Components\") including open source and free software components, each of which has its own copyright and its own license conditions (\"Third Party License\"). A list of included Software Components and their respective licenses can be found in under Open source licenses
To the extent any Third Party License grants the User rights to use, copy or modify the Open Source Component that are broader or narrower than the rights granted in this Agreement, then such rights shall take precedence over the rights and restrictions granted in this Agreement solely for such Third Party Components.
5. Disclaimer of Warranty This License is provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis for the intended purposes as determined by Danfoss only and any use hereof is at User’s sole risk. The Application and results and information generated thereby cannot substitute technical advice but must be verified by the User, they are not promises and should not be relied on as accurate data or analyses.
Danfoss disclaims all warranties and conditions regarding the Application, whether express, implied, or statutory, including, but not limited to, conditions of merchantability, satisfactory quality, fitness for a particular purpose, accuracy and non-infringement of third parties’ rights. Danfoss does not warrant that the Application will meet your requirements or that the operation hereof will be uninterrupted or error-free.
6. Limitation of Liability To the extent not prohibited by law, in no event shall Danfoss be liable for any direct, special, indirect or consequential damages, whatsoever, including, without limitation, damage to property, damages for loss of savings or profits, or loss of data arising out of any use of the Application.
7. Miscellaneous The License shall automatically terminate upon User’s breach of any of the terms of this Agreement. Danfoss may terminate the License at its sole discretion without prior notice.
This Agreement and the License is subject to the substantive law of Denmark. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Denmark."
"This may take up to 3 minutes Keep phone charged and close to Danfoss Eco™"
"Check \"%1$s\" for batteries and keep phone close to Danfoss Eco™"
"Failed to check for new firmware Please try again later"
"This may take up to 3 minutes Keep phone charged and close to Danfoss Eco™"
Danfoss Eco™ has been updated successfully
Keep close to the Danfoss Eco™ while firmware is transferred
CC Panel not found on Danfoss Cloud
Please connect to a thermostat in order to adjust temperatures
for At Home, Away/Asleep and Vacation periods
"The following pages show the basic use of the app's functions"
Welcome to the Danfoss Eco™ App
by selecting thermostats from the menu
to fit your daily rhythm with precise temperature control
when needed, for maximum comfort and savings
confirmed by the red light ring on the Danfoss Eco™
by setting time and date for maximum savings

Bluetooth is used to communicate with the thermostat
You can rename %1$s later in the Thermostats menu
\"%1$s\" is now linked to this app.
"Lower the heating to safest minimum temperature"
"End pause mode and switch to scheduled heating"
"This may take up to 3 minutes Danfoss Eco™ needs firmware Recovery to function"
Choose which days you want to copy the schedule to
Disconnect and remove %@ from list of known locations?
Swipe to disconnect and delete. Select to rename.
Enables Danfoss Eco™ to start heating early to reach the target temperature on scheduled time
"Moderate is recommended for district energy and condensing boilers. Quick is recommended for non-condensing boilers."

"When installed, the thermostat is regulating the temperature when mounted correctly on a radiator valve.
When not installed, and the \"M\" symbol is flashing in the Danfoss Eco™ display, the thermostat is ready to be mounted on a radiator valve. In this mode, Danfoss Eco™ is not adjusting the temperature."

"This will disconnect the app from the Eco temporarily.
Do you want to uninstall this Eco?"

"This will disconnect the app from the Eco temporarily.
Is the Eco mounted safely on the radiator valve?"
The thermostat orientation can influence performance, for example, where the thermostat is placed closer to heat from the pipes and valve.
The minimum temperature protects your heating system
"This removes %1$s from the list of paired Eco's"

"There is no connection to the Danfoss Cloud on the current Mobile Broadband connection.
1. Please try to improve your Mobile Broadband signal by moving closer to a window or even outside.
- Otherwise -
2. If you are able to do so, please use a WiFi connection instead."

"There is no connection to the Danfoss Cloud on the current WiFi connection.
1. Ensure that you are within proper range of the WiFi router to provide a good signal.
- Otherwise -
2. If on a public WiFi, please check if additional login is required."

"There is no connection to the CC Panel on the current WiFi connection, but it seems that the problem is not on your cell phone.
Please ensure that the CC Panel is itself connected to the internet"
CC Panel not found on Danfoss Cloud

"It has been detected that there is no available networks on your cell phone.
Please enable either WiFi or Mobile Broadband and wait for the internet connection to reestablish."
Please select both leaving and returning date
"End vacation mode and switch to scheduled heating"
"Lowers the temperature to %1$sº C while you are away"
Your application is not compatible with the Home Controller. Please make sure that both are updated to latest version.
The app found information about previous crashes. Would you like to send this data to the developer?
Press the green pulsating button on the thermostat to confirm saving configuration
The save operation timed out. Please try again.
The new configuration has been saved
Temperature is now too low in %2$s. Perhaps a window is open?
Temperature is now too low in %2$s in %1$s. Perhaps a window is open?
The update could not be downloaded. Would you like to try again?
Factory reset complete, returning to main menu
Press the green pulsating button on the thermostat to confirm factory reset
Your thermostat should now look like the above. Press the thermostat to confirm
"This will delete all changes on your thermostat. To initiate, press 'Reset'"

"
Thermostat in %2$s is no longer available online.
Thermostat in %2$s in %1$s is no longer available online.
Thermostat in %2$s in house %1$s went offline
Select a user to disconnect and delete.
Receive notifications if a thermostat goes offline
Receive notifications for too low temperature
This will make the thermostat forget the selected user, would you like to proceed?
Do you wish to abort the setup?
Ensure that only one thermostat is turned on
Activate thermostat by a simple touch
Make sure only one thermostat is activated
Press the green pulsating button on the thermostat to confirm the connection
Your thermostat has been configured, and it will now be connected to the app.
Verify that the setup is correct
A new house will be created
Your thermostat has been configured, and it will now be connected to the app.
To enable your phone to connect to the thermostat you need to disable the setting \"%1$s\". You will now be taken to the settings screen.
Location services needs to be enabled to the app to find the thermostat. Please enable location services.
Press \"Next\" when the indicator on the thermostat pulsates blue

"When the thermostat is open for connections the button in the upper left corner will be pulsating blue. The thermostat will open for connections when turned on. If your thermostat is already turned on but not pulsating blue you will need to turn it off and on again. To turn the thermostat off press and hold the upper left button for 3 seconds while the thermostat counts down on the display. Afterwards press the upper left button again to turn it on. Wait for the thermostat to start and the button to pulsate blue, this might take up to 30 seconds. Note: The thermostat is open for connections in 2 minutes after being turned on."
The thermostat was unable to connect to the cloud. The thermostat is showing an error code on the display, please select the appropriate one below to be guided through troubleshooting.
The supplied hexa code is for a thermostat with breakout active, but the connected thermostat does not have breakout active.
The thermostat succesfully connected to the your WiFi network, but no internet is available.Please ensure that your WiFi has access to the internet.
The thermstat succesfully connected to the your WiFi network, but the thermostat did not recieve and IP-address.Please ensure that your WiFi configured correctly and retry connecting.

"The app was unable to establish a connection to the cloud, and was thus unable to verfiy that the thermostat was connected. Ensure that the smartphone has an active internet connection and retry connecting the thermostat."
"The phone is not able to connect to your thermostat. Please turn the thermostat off and on again. Note: The thermostat is open for connection in 2 minutes after being turned on."
An unknown error occured when the thermostat was trying to connect to the cloud. Please contact support.
The thermostat was unable to connect to your WiFi with the supplied SSID and password.The next steps will allow you to go through the information and ensure that it is correct.

"The thermostat will now connect to your WiFi network, and be updated via the internet. When the control button is pulsating blue, then the system is ready. Push the ”Continiue” button below.
Note - Depending of your network speed, then this can take several minutes"

"In order to use the thermostat, it needs to be updated. Next step is to configure your thermostat to connect to the Wi-Fi network.
The thermostat will then automaticaly update to the newest software, and afterwards the thermostat will reboot and be ready for initial setup.
This update process will secure you the optimal experince with your fieldtest thermostat."
Find HEXAcode in the existing Danfoss ECtemp™ Touch thermostat before you remove it
Choose the house the thermostat is connected to
Choose a name to the new house
Verify that the setup is correct
Type the password for your Wi-Fi
Write the name of the person using this phone
Name the room where the thermostat is placed
Choose the room type where the system is installed
Choose type of installed floor sensor
Choose the wireless Wi-Fi network, that the thermostat should connect to.
"Select the name of the Wi-Fi network, that the thermostat should connect to. If the network is not mentioned, please write it on the line below."
Select if timer control should be switched on
Mount your Danfoss ECtemp™ Smart into the wall
"Name can't be more than 32 characters long"
"Name can't be more than 32 characters long"
"Password can't be more than 32 characters long"
"Password can't be more than 63 characters long"
Cannot send message due to no connection to thermostat
The permission is needed in order to continue setup
"Couldn't find your thermostat, make sure it's in AP mode and try again"
Your new thermostat should look like this
Your thermostat needs to be connected to your Wi-Fi network. This will guide you through the steps
Congratulations on setting up your new thermostat, press done to continue to start controlling your thermostat
This thermostat has not been set up by a technician.
Are you replacing a Danfoss ECtemp™ Touch?
If your Danfoss ECtemp™ Smart is to replace an existing Danfoss ECtemp™ Touch, it is possible to copy the configuration using ”Replace Danfoss ECtemp™ Touch”
"Network can't be more than 32 characters long"

"You are now able to finish the user setup of the thermostat, or you can choose to setup the next thermostat.
Note - if you continue to setup a new thermostat, then the setup of the current will not be complete and needs to be finalized later."
Continue to make ready to use
Find HEXAcode in the existing Danfoss ECtemp™ Touch thermostat before you remove it
Select whether room temperature should be controlled using a room + floor sensor or a floor sensor only.

Select the flooring used to set default comfort, eco, min, and max floor temperatures (°C). Tiles: 27, 20, 23, and 35. Hardwood: 25, 20, 22, and 33. Laminate: 24, 20, 21, and 33. Carpet: 23, 20, 20, and 35.
Select the approximate load of the heating element (W) to estimate installation power consumption (kWh).
Select the room type to set default comfort and eco temperatures (°C). Living room: 21 and 17. Bedroom: 19 and 17. Bathroom: 23 and 17. Kitchen: 20 and 17.
Select the installed floor sensor. If the installed sensor is not available, select a similar type. Sensor resistance and current measured temperature are shown in parentheses ().
"Select timer ON to optimize energy savings. Time periods can be altered later on."
The HEXA string is not valid
For safety reasons we recommend that only professional technicians set up thermostats.

"For safety reasons we recommend that the following configuration is done only by a professional technician.
Wrong configuration can cause damage to your heating system."
The phone is now connecting to your thermostat
The phone is getting information from your thermostat
When the circle is green confirm with a single touch
Congratulations, the thermostat is now connected
Thermostat is connecting to the cloud
Congratulations, the thermostat is now connected
The thermostat can only be connected to 10 different phones at a time. Please select a phone to remove from the thermostat to allow this phone to connect.
The setup is now being saved to the thermostat
The setup has been saved to the thermostat, and it is ready for regulation.
The setup has been saved to the thermostat, and it is ready for use.

"You have a choice between 3 options to get the system started.
To get full benefit of your thermostat, you need to spend up to 5 minutes to connect your phone and setup the thermostat."
Congratulations on your new Danfoss ECtemp™ Smart system
Congratulations with your new controller, follow this guide to connect it to your app
Is the receiver of the house allowed to remove users from the thermostats?
"Couldn't find other device, please double-check the code"
"One or more thermostats already have ten users, can't add a new user"
"Couldn't send configuration, connection to the other app was lost"
"Couldn't send configuration, connection to the server was lost"
"Can't share house configuration when there are unconnected thermostats"
"To share the current house please open the app on the phone that is to receive the setup and select the menu \"Receive house\". When prompted for a pairingscode please use the code below:"
The code has expired, hit next to generate a new one and try again
Connection to floor sensor is lost
Thermostat is overheated, heating is turned off
The connection to the thermostat has been lost.
Permission to use the filesystem is needed in order to handle app updates.
Send warning if temperature is below
